Class HTMLUtil

java.lang.Object
  de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.xml.HTMLUtil

public final class HTMLUtil
extends Object

Class with HTML related utility functions, in particular HTML generation.

writeXHTML

public static void writeXHTML(Document htmldoc,
                              OutputStream out)
                       throws IOException,
                              Error
Write an HTML document to an output stream.

Parameters:
htmldoc - Document to output
out - Stream to write to
Throws:
IOException - thrown on IO errors
Error - thrown on other errors, such as HTML transformation
